sentences.english: But they might discover a fantastic treasure down there.
sentences.chinese: 但他们可能会在那儿好现珍宝。

sentences.english: Is there any lobsters in Jumbo today?
sentences.chinese: 今天“珍宝”酒家有龙虾吗？

sentences.english: She serves this with duck and coconut milk curry.
sentences.chinese: 她的珍宝饭用了鸭子肉和椰奶咖喱。

sentences.english: After years of collecting, he has stored up lots of rare treasures.
sentences.chinese: 经过多年的收集，他已经秘藏了很多稀世的珍宝。

sentences.english: Light finds her treasure of colours through the antagonism of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 光线在与云霓的抗衡中觅到了她五光十色的珍宝。

sentences.english: I can see that you're only interested in the exceptionally rare ones.
sentences.chinese: 可以看出你只对那些稀世珍宝感兴趣。

sentences.english: Cancerians have a deep love for home, and they truly treasure their friends and family.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座的人是个恋家控，他们视朋友家人为珍宝。

sentences.english: She was in no hurry, relishing each blossom as a rare and delicate treasure.
sentences.chinese: 她不慌不忙，像欣赏稀有珍宝似地欣赏着每一朵花。

sentences.english: That's how 1 got these horses and precious things.
sentences.chinese: 由是之故，我得此马，及以珍宝，来投王国。

sentences.english: Harris is chief curator at the Page Museum, which houses treasures from the tar pits.
sentences.chinese: 培基博物馆内收藏着从焦油坑里挖掘到的珍宝。

sentences.english: More treasure of ancient Greece lies in the National Archeological Museum.
sentences.chinese: 中收藏更多的古希腊珍宝。

sentences.english: At present, the blue china of Yue Kiln has been collected as the treasure by the museums all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 如今，世界各国博物馆都把越窑青瓷作为珍宝收藏。

sentences.english: It spread gems to fulfil all wishes.
There is no rare treasure here.
"I am the keeper of the family jewels, " Cano says.
sentences.chinese: “”我是这个珍宝家族的看护者，卡诺说。

definition: precious mineral deposits/hidden treasure/(fig.) treasure/(Buddhism) the treasure of Buddha's law
treasure-house/treasury/treasure-trove (often fig., book of treasured wisdom)
